material.mattext: Write in words, what the event "not L" is, and then find P(not L) using the multiplication rule.

"not L" is the event "the student gets none of the questions right" or in other words, "not L" is that the student gets all the questions wrong. And so,
P(not L)=P(getting all the questions wrong)=P(WWWWWWWWWW)= .75*.75*.75*.75*.75*.75*.75*.75*.75*.75 = .0563
